predicate.note: Frames file for 'accede' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'agree'.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Labor unions and Democrats long fought the idea , but recently acceded to it in the face of Bush administration insistence .
example.arg: in the face of Bush administration insistence

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Perhaps even the American apologists will now accede .
